Articles.Content: In Dusker, you are a survivor on a derelict ship with no recollection of what happened. Pretty normal sci-fi game so far right? But what makes this game different is that you are not a space marine, or space miner, or whatever hands on job they tend to put you into. Instead, you are a salvage drone operator. Your interface is mostly based on what you have on the drones - camera, motion sensors, probes, all of which can be damaged and failed while you have to adapt - and most uniquely, you control all your drones using text commands only! If you ever enjoy those hacking game where you rapid fire commands on keyboard, you will find the feeling here, only even more exciting:
